response.explain: The previous action code was successful in cooking the brisket. Now, the next step is to put the cooked brisket on the chopping board.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take the brisket out of the fridge
(3) Cook the brisket
(4) Put the cooked brisket on the chopping board
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 4: Put the cooked brisket on the chopping board
    cutting_board = registry(env,"cutting_board_188")
    brisket = registry(env,"brisket_189")
    put_ontop(robot, brisket, cutting_board)
    donothing(env)
